refnamediv.refpurpose: Writes multi-channel audio data, with user-controllable channels, to an external device or stream.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Writes multi-channel audio data, with user-controllable channels, to an external device or stream.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: outch outputs asig1 on the channel determined by kchan1, asig2 on the channel determined by kchan2, etc.

note.para: The highest number for kchanX available for use with outch depends on nchnls. If kchanX is greater than nchnls, asigX will be silent. Note that outch will give a warning but not an error in this case.
